CustomField.formula: if(LEN(ShippingStreet)>0, ShippingStreet& " " , "" ) & BR() & if(LEN(ShippingCity)>0, ShippingCity& ", " , "" )& if(LEN(ShippingState)>0, ShippingState& " " , "" )& if(LEN(ShippingPostalCode)>0, ShippingPostalCode,"") & BR() & If(LEN(ShippingCountry) >0, ShippingCountry,"")
CustomField.label: Address
